# aidash - Chrome Extension

> Seamless Chrome Extension for Modern Browsing

## Overview

AiDash is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your AI chat experience with intelligent organization, automation, and privacy protection.

## Key Features

- **AI-Powered Organization**: Automatically summarize, tag, and organize all your AI conversations
- **Workflow Automation**: Create custom workflows and automations to streamline your chat management
- **Data Privacy Shield**: Keep your conversations safe from AI platform leaks with advanced privacy protection
- **Multi-Platform Support**: Connect and manage all your AI platforms in one unified dashboard
- **Smart Search & Folders**: Instantly find any conversation and organize with custom folders
- **Notion Integration**: Easily export your chats and notes to Notion for seamless workflow
- **Local-First Approach**: Your data stays on your device with complete privacy and control
- **Intelligent Tagging**: Automatic categorization of conversations for easy retrieval

## Pricing

- **Free**: Basic features for individual users
- **Pro ($9/month)**: Advanced features with unlimited sync
- **Enterprise ($29/month)**: Full feature set with team management

## Technical Details

- Platform: Chrome Extension (Manifest V3)
- Technology: Modern web technologies
- Performance: Optimized for speed and efficiency
- Privacy: No tracking, your data stays yours

## Installation

Available on Chrome Web Store. Install with one click and start enhancing your browsing experience immediately.

## Support

For support, feature requests, or feedback, visit our website or contact us through the extension.
